abilities.description: Marci grabs an allied or enemy target and throws it effortlessly behind her, damaging and slowing the unit if it's an enemy. Any enemy units in the landing area will also be damaged and slowed.

abilities.name: Rebound
abilities.description: Marci bounds to the targeted allied unit, choosing a direction and distance she will spring away from it. Upon reaching the unit, Marci lunges to her final destination, damaging and stunning enemies where she lands.

abilities.name: Unleash
abilities.description: Marci taps a hidden power, gaining Fury charges that allow her to deliver a rapid sequence of strikes that slow movement and attack speed of the target for 2s. The last strike in every Fury combo creates a damaging pulse around the target. In between Fury combos, Marci is unable to attack for 1,5s.

abilities.name: Sidekick
abilities.description: Marci's loyalty helps ensure survival, imbuing a chosen allied hero and herself with shared lifesteal and attack damage. If Marci and her ally are further apart from each other than 1750, the ally receives no bonuses and Marci only gets 50% until they get close again. Marci's lifesteal also heals her ally and the ally lifesteal also heals Marci.

abilities.name: Bodyguard
abilities.description: Marci protects an allied hero. For 6s, whenever the ally attacks or is attacked by an enemy, Marci counter-attacks that target if they are within her attack range plus 125. The ally also gains bonus armor and healing from Marci's lifesteal for the duration. Passively grants Marci lifesteal and bonus attack damage.

abilities.name: Rebound
abilities.description: Decreases the cooldown of Rebound, it can be cast on enemies, and causes Marci to also get the speed boost when she casts it.

abilities.name: Unleash
abilities.description: Reduces Unleash cooldown by 10 seconds and causes Unleash to apply a basic dispel on Marci. While Unleash is Active, all of Marci's abilities unleash pulses when cast. All of Marci's unleash pulses will silence units for 1 seconds.

abilities.name: Starstorm
abilities.description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 675 radius will be struck a second time for 80% of the damage.

abilities.name: Sacred Arrow
abilities.description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0,01 to 2,6 seconds, with bonus damage up to 150 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Moonlight Shadow
abilities.description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.

abilities.name: Solar Flare
abilities.description: Gradually increases attack speed and damage of Mirana and all allied heroes, reaching maximum power after 6s.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Upon landing, launches a projectile along Sagan's leap path, dealing damage and slowing units affected and guarantees them to be hit with a secondary Starstorm if that spell is cast. Leap does not break Moonlight Shadow invisibility.

abilities.name: Sacred Arrow
abilities.description: Causes Sacred Arrow to release a Starstorm on enemies along the travel path of the primary arrow, releasing a second Starstorm that deals less damage to the impacted unit.

abilities.name: Split Shot
abilities.description: Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.

abilities.name: Mystic Snake
abilities.description: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage. Damage and speed increases with each jump. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake returns a percentage of the targets' total mana.

abilities.name: Gorgon's Grasp
abilities.description: Medusa fires arrows in a line that land in 3 groups, with each grouping larger than the previous. Enemies struck by a volley of arrows take an initial burst of damage and then are rooted, cannot turn, are revealed to the enemy, and take damage per second.

abilities.name: Stone Gaze
abilities.description: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, and take bonus physical attack damage.

abilities.name: Cold Blooded
abilities.description: When Medusa is targeted with a spell, a single-target Mystic Snake is sent back towards the enemy.

abilities.name: Mystic Snake
abilities.description: Causes Mystic Snake to turn enemies hit into stone. Stone duration increases with each bounce of the Mystic Snake.

abilities.name: Earthbind
abilities.description: Tosses a net at the target point, rooting down all enemy units in an area around it.

abilities.name: Poof
abilities.description: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1,5 seconds, damaging the enemy in both the departure and arrival locations.

abilities.name: Ransack
abilities.description: Steals health from the enemy with each strike and heals all other Meepos for that amount.

abilities.name: Divided We Stand
abilities.description: Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience, attributes and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die. Divided We Stand grants all Meepos bonus Magic Resistance.

abilities.name: Dig
abilities.description: Digs into the ground for a short duration, dispelling Meepo and causing him to become invulnerable and untargetable for 3s. Restores 25% of his max health over that duration.

abilities.name: MegaMeepo
abilities.description: Primary Meepo mounts all other Meepos in a 600 radius around him on top of his shoulders. While in this form, he gains 40% of the other Meepo stats and can Fling them at enemies, dealing damage and slowing them.

abilities.name: Dead Shot
abilities.description: Muerta fires a ghostly trickshot at an enemy unit or tree. When the bullet strikes, it damages and briefly slows, then ricochets in the targeted direction.

abilities.name: The Calling
abilities.description: Summons a group of 4 revenants that slowly circle the targeted location. Enemies within the area are slowed and have reduced attack speed. Revenants deal damage and silence enemies as they pass through them.

abilities.name: Gunslinger
abilities.description: Toggleable. When toggled on, Muerta's attacks have a chance to fire a second shot at another target.

abilities.name: Pierce the Veil
abilities.description: Muerta transforms, becoming immune to physical damage. All of her attack damage is dealt as magical damage and Muerta gains bonus attack damage and phased movement.

abilities.name: Ofrenda
abilities.description: Muerta places a sacred altar at the targeted location that increases her attack speed when she is near it.

abilities.name: Pierce the Veil
abilities.description: Muerta gains 30% Spell Lifesteal during Pierce the Veil.

abilities.name: Parting Shot
abilities.description: Muerta precisely shoots a hero in their soul, separating it from their physical body and knocking it 150 units away.

abilities.name: Boundless Strike
abilities.description: Monkey King enlarges his staff and slams it against the ground, stunning enemies in a line and damaging them with bonus damage and a critical hit based on his attack. Has True Strike.

abilities.name: Tree Dance
abilities.description: Monkey King jumps to a tree and perches atop it. While perched, he gains the Primal Spring ability-a channeled leap attack. If Monkey King's tree is destroyed, he falls and is stunned for 4 seconds. Taking damage while on the ground puts Tree Dance on cooldown.

abilities.name: Jingu Mastery
abilities.description: Monkey King's attacks awaken the Jingu Bang's power. Upon the fourth hit on the same enemy hero, Monkey King earns 4 charged attacks that have bonus damage and lifesteal.

abilities.name: Wukong's Command
abilities.description: Monkey King creates a circular formation of soldiers that spread out from his position. If Monkey King leaves the area his soldiers disperse. The soldiers have Monkey King's attack and only target heroes. Monkey King is granted bonus armor for the spell's duration.

abilities.name: Boundless Strike
abilities.description: Boundless Strike applies Primal Spring with 60% of the max channeling duration power to enemies along the staff and at the end of the staff. When Boundless Strike is set to alt-cast, Monkey King leaps to the end of his staff.

abilities.name: Wukong's Command
abilities.description: Spawns a monkey soldier near Monkey King at regular intervals. Soldiers do not spawn while invisible or on trees. Soldiers only attack buildings when Monkey King himself is nearby. Soldiers can now gain Jingu Mastery charges independently.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Creates multiple images of Naga Siren under her control.

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.description: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking. Can target invulnerable and sleeping units.

abilities.name: Song of the Siren
abilities.description: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Allies in range recover a percentage of their health per second. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.

abilities.name: Deluge
abilities.description: Naga Siren and all of her images hit nearby units with a damaging wave of water that reduces enemy status resistance and caps their max movement speed.

abilities.name: Song of the Siren
abilities.description: Increases Song of the Siren's regen and adds mana regeneration for allies.

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.description: Increases cast range and projectile speed.  Allows Ensnare to target and affect Debuff Immune units.

abilities.name: Waveform
abilities.description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform and attacks all enemies it goes through with a penalty.

abilities.name: Adaptive Strike (Agility)
abilities.description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used.

abilities.name: Adaptive Strike (Strength)
abilities.description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun is dealt.

abilities.name: Attribute Shift (Agility Gain)
abilities.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.

abilities.name: Attribute Shift (Strength Gain)
abilities.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.

abilities.name: Morph
abilities.description: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.

abilities.name: Attribute Shift (Agility Gain)
abilities.description: Morphling can shift attributes while stunned. Reduces mana cost.

abilities.name: Morph
abilities.description: Adds an alt-cast to Morph. When enabled, a strong illusion is created of the target hero that can cast all of the hero's basic abilities. If the illusion is alive when Morphling toggles the ability, he will take the place of the illusion, destroying it.

abilities.name: Death Pulse
abilities.description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.

abilities.name: Ghost Shroud
abilities.description: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.

abilities.name: Heartstopper Aura
abilities.description: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.

abilities.name: Reaper's Scythe
abilities.description: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. If Necrophos kills an enemy this way, he'll permanently gain Health and Mana Regen. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.

abilities.name: Death Seeker
abilities.description: Necrophos turns into a large Death Pulse towards the target unit's position. Once it arrives to the location, the Death Pulse spreads towards nearby enemies and allies.

abilities.name: Heartstopper Aura
abilities.description: Heartstopper Aura's Health Decay is increased by 50% of Necrophos's current health regeneration.

abilities.name: Void
abilities.description: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit, reduces its vision and deals damage. At night, Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities, and its effects lasts longer.

abilities.name: Crippling Fear
abilities.description: Night Stalker horrifies all nearby enemies, causing them to become silenced and take damage over time while near him.  The effect lasts longer at night.

abilities.name: Hunter in the Night
abilities.description: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.

abilities.name: Dark Ascension
abilities.description: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. Night Stalker gains flight and bonus damage during this time. Has unobstructed vision.

abilities.name: Hunter in the Night
abilities.description: Hunter in the Night may be cast on a creep, instantly killing it and restoring some of Night Stalker's maximum health and mana. Cannot target ancients during the daytime.

abilities.name: Crippling Fear
abilities.description: Reduces cooldown of Crippling Fear and it becomes a toggled ability that takes a percentage of max mana per second to maintain after the initial duration time.

abilities.name: Sprout
abilities.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, damaging and trapping it in place and providing vision in a 250 radius.

abilities.name: Teleportation
abilities.description: Teleports to any point on the map. Gains a barrier after arriving to its destination.

abilities.name: Nature's Call
abilities.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of Nature's Prophet.

abilities.name: Wrath of Nature
abilities.description: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies that are in vision starting with those closest to the cast point. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage, up to the maximum after 16 are hit.

abilities.name: Curse of the Oldgrowth
abilities.description: Applies a curse on all enemy heroes within 1200 range, displaying them in fog, slowing them, and causing damage over time based on the number of trees within 250 radius. Treants count as trees for this purpose.

abilities.name: Wrath of Nature
abilities.description: Lowers cooldown by 25s. Entangles all enemies it hits. Duration scales from 1,5s up to 3s seconds at max bounce.

abilities.name: Fireblast
abilities.description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

abilities.name: Ignite
abilities.description: Drenches the target and another random unit in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.description: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Gives bonus attacks speed if cast on Ogre himself. Can be cast on towers.

abilities.name: Multicast
abilities.description: Enables Ogre Magi to cast his abilities and items multiple times with each use.

abilities.name: Fire Shield
abilities.description: Creates a shield around the target ally, absorbing a percentage of the damage of next 3 attacks from enemy heroes. When damage is absorbed, a fireball is launched at the attacker. Can be cast on towers.

abilities.name: Unrefined Fireblast
abilities.description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing 150 + 1,5x Ogre's Strength in damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is 35% of Ogre Magi's current mana.

abilities.name: Purification
abilities.description: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Repel
abilities.description: Grants Debuff Immunity with 60% magic resistance to the target, as well as bonus Strength and HP Regen based on the amount of Debuffs on them.

abilities.name: Hammer of Purity
abilities.description: Omniknight imbues his hammer with holy power, causing his attack to deal pure damage based on a percentage of his base damage.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.description: Omniknight calls upon a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage to allied units in an area.

abilities.name: Purification
abilities.description: After a 3s delay, the target is Purified again with 65% effectiveness.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.description: Guardian Angel has global cast range, increased radius, and affects buildings. Amplifies health regeneration and incoming heals for the duration.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units take damage, then are hurled into the air and stunned.

abilities.name: Mind Flare
abilities.description: Deals damages to the enemy equal to a percentage of its Max Mana. Additionally deals damage equal to a percentage of damage the target received from Nyx Assassin in the past 15s. Instantly kills non-ancient creeps.

abilities.name: Spiked Carapace
abilities.description: When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.

abilities.name: Vendetta
abilities.description: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack. Nyx Assassin has 75 additional attack range and a 70% faster attack animation for this attack.

abilities.name: Vendetta
abilities.description: Vendetta applies Break on attack.

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mind Flare and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. Nyx gains damage reduction from all damage sources.

abilities.name: Swashbuckle
abilities.description: Pangolier dashes along the target line, then slashes all enemies in the drawn direction with several quick swipes.

abilities.name: Shield Crash
abilities.description: Pangolier jumps in the air and slams back to the ground in front of his current position, damaging and slowing all enemies in a radius. For each enemy hero hit, he gains an all damage shield for a short time.

abilities.name: Lucky Shot
abilities.description: Pangolier rolls the dice and lets fate decide the outcome for his enemies. Grants a chance to drastically slow their attack speed and reduce armor on any damage dealt by Pangolier's attacks or abilities.

abilities.name: Rolling Thunder
abilities.description: Pangolier curls into a debuff immune ball with 60% additional magic resistance and rolls out. When rolling, he moves at an increased speed and can move through trees, but has a decreased ability to turn. Striking enemies knocks them back, inflicting damage proportional to his attack damage and stunning them when they land.

abilities.name: Roll Up
abilities.description: Pangolier curls into an immobile protective ball, gaining debuff immunity, 60% magic resistance, and allowing him to turn. Can be cast during Rolling Thunder to temporarily hit the brakes. Can cast Rolling Thunder and Shield Crash during Roll Up. If enemies attack Pangolier during this, he will roll away from the attacker, applying Rolling Thunder damage/stun if there are enemies in the way.

abilities.name: Shield Crash
abilities.description: Causes Shield Crash to cast a 2-attack Swashbuckle every 90 degrees around your hero.

abilities.name: Fortune's End
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Gathers Oracle's power into a bolt of scouring energy that, when released, damages, roots, and dispels enemies of buffs in an area around the target. If target is an ally it will only dispel debuffs. The root duration is equal to the time spent channeling.

abilities.name: Fate's Edict
abilities.description: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them if they are an enemy and granting them 100% magic damage resistance if they are an ally.

abilities.name: Purifying Flames
abilities.description: Burns away impurities, dealing heavy magic damage to the target before causing them to regenerate health over time. The amount of health regenerated over its duration exceeds the amount of initial damage. Can be cast on enemies and allies.

abilities.name: False Promise
abilities.description: Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is amplified. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.

abilities.name: Rain of Destiny
abilities.description: Brings forth rain to the target area. Enemies standing in the area receive damage and have reduced heal amplification. Allies in the area heal and have increased incoming heal amplification.

abilities.name: False Promise
abilities.description: Causes False Promise to have a 0,15 second fade delay invisibility and grants the ally 25% bonus Spell Damage and 0,25 reduced Base Attack Time.

abilities.name: Arcane Orb
abilities.description: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Destroyer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool.

abilities.name: Astral Imprisonment
abilities.description: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals damage to the target and steals a percentage of their max mana.

abilities.name: Essence Flux
abilities.description: Passively grants a chance to restore a percentage of your max mana each time you cast an ability.

abilities.name: Sanity's Eclipse
abilities.description: Unleashes a psychic blast that deals damage to enemies based on the difference between your mana and the target's mana. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment. Deals bonus damage to illusions.

abilities.name: Astral Imprisonment
abilities.description: Astral Imprisonment now deals damage in an area. Also allows allies to move at 70% movement speed during Astral Imprisonment (they are visible, but untargettable and can't perform any other actions).

abilities.name: Essence Flux
abilities.description: Damage that would bring Outworld Destroyer below 20% health triggers a strong dispel. In addition, when the effect is triggered Outworld Destroyer consumes of all his mana to create an all damage barrier equal to 65% of his maximum mana that lasts for 15 seconds. This effect can occur every 80 seconds and cannot be refreshed.

abilities.name: Icarus Dive
abilities.description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.

abilities.name: Fire Spirits
abilities.description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around Phoenix. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.

abilities.name: Sun Ray
abilities.description: Phoenix expels a beam of light at the cost of its own health. The beam damages enemies and heals allies for a base amount plus a percentage of their health. The percentage increases as the beam continues to fire.

abilities.name: Supernova
abilities.description: The Phoenix willingly ends its current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area. The sun can be destroyed by attacks from enemy Heroes. After 6 seconds the sun explodes, stunning all nearby enemies while restoring Phoenix to full health and mana with refreshed abilities.

abilities.name: Sun Ray
abilities.description: Allows Sun Ray to be cast during Supernova, and slows affected enemies by 10%.

abilities.name: Supernova
abilities.description: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together.

abilities.name: Stifling Dagger
abilities.description: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing 65+30% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.

abilities.name: Phantom Strike
abilities.description: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.

abilities.name: Blur
abilities.description: Phantom Assassin blurs her body, disjointing incoming projectiles, increasing her movement speed, causing her to be impossible to see until she attacks or comes near enemy heroes, towers, or outposts.

abilities.name: Coup de Grace
abilities.description: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, acquiring a chance of gaining Deadly Focus with each attack. When attacking with Deadly Focus, Phantom Assassin will consume the buff and guarantee a critical hit. Stifling Dagger has a bonus chance to cause Deadly Focus.

abilities.name: Fan of Knives
abilities.description: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her, dealing a percentage of each victim's max health on impact and applying Break.

abilities.name: Blur
abilities.description: Causes Blur to have instant cast time and applies a dispel. Any time Phantom Assassin gets a hero kill, her abilities are refreshed. Reduces cooldown.

abilities.name: Spirit Lance
abilities.description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.

abilities.name: Doppelganger
abilities.description: Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After 1 second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 500% bonus damage and deals -80% less damage.

abilities.name: Phantom Rush
abilities.description: When targeting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.

abilities.name: Juxtapose
abilities.description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence on an attack, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Juxtapose
abilities.description: Adds an active ability to Juxtapose. Renders Phantom Lancer invisible for up to 8 seconds while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies. His movement speed is increased by 15% during this invisibility.

abilities.name: Spirit Lance
abilities.description: Spirit Lance bounces twice on enemies, prioritizing Heroes. Increases Spirit Lance illusion damage.

abilities.name: Meat Hook
abilities.description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge, killing it if it's a non-ancient creep and dealing damage if it is an enemy otherwise.

abilities.name: Rot
abilities.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

abilities.name: Meat Shield
abilities.description: Pudge covers himself with a layer of flesh that blocks damage of any type taken from any source.

abilities.name: Dismember
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Damage is increased by Pudge's Strength and heals him for the total amount. Pudge pulls the unit at a rate of 75 units, up to a minimum of 125 range.

abilities.name: Dismember
abilities.description: Decreases cooldown, and allows targeting an ally with bonus cast range to swallow them and heal them for a percentage of their max health per second.

abilities.name: Rot
abilities.description: Increases Rot radius and damage, and causes it to reduce enemy health regen.

abilities.name: Onslaught
abilities.description: Primal Beast charges up and then runs in the chosen direction, knocking back enemies and allies alike. Enemy units are damaged and stunned on impact. The longer the charge duration, the farther Primal Beast's momentum will carry him.

abilities.name: Trample
abilities.description: Primal Beast stomps over everything. For every 140 units traveled, all enemies around the Beast receive damage. Deals base damage plus a multiplier of Primal Beast's attack damage. Primal Beast is disarmed for the duration of the ability.

abilities.name: Uproar
abilities.description: The Beast's temper passively provides bonus damage. Additionally, for every instance of 50 damage or more Primal Beast takes from enemy heroes, he accumulates stacks of Uproar.

abilities.name: Pulverize
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Primal Beast channels his rage, grabbing the target enemy and slamming them into the ground repeatedly, damaging and mini-stunning any enemies caught in the AoE. Each consecutive hit deals bonus damage. Lasts 2,3 seconds.

abilities.name: Rock Throw
abilities.description: Primal Beast throws a rock at the target location that stuns and damages enemies. The rock cannot be thrown within a minimum range of Primal Beast. After landing, the rock splits into 3 additional fragments that land behind the initial target location.

abilities.name: Uproar
abilities.description: When Primal Beast activates Uproar, he releases 3 waves of 2 projectiles per stack of uproar each in a circle around him. Projectiles deal damage and Break enemies hit. After a short delay, each projectile splinters in two.

abilities.name: Illusory Orb
abilities.description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.

abilities.name: Waning Rift
abilities.description: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.

abilities.name: Dream Coil
abilities.description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Puck's attacks deal bonus magic damage. Puck attacks all enemies within its attack range every time it phase shifts.

abilities.name: Dream Coil
abilities.description: All enemies affected by Dream Coil are attacked at a rate equal to 90% of Puck's attack rate. The attacks continue while the target is stunned if they break the Dream Coil.

abilities.name: Plasma Field
abilities.description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.

abilities.name: Static Link
abilities.description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active.

abilities.name: Storm Surge
abilities.description: There's a chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release a forked lightning that strikes the target and other nearby enemies, prioritizing the unit type of the attacker, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: Eye of the Storm
abilities.description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at the enemy unit with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing armor.

abilities.name: Static Link
abilities.description: Increases Cast Range. Allows Static Link to be put on alt-cast to pull Razor and his Target towards at each other at a speed of 75.

abilities.name: Eye of the Storm
abilities.description: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.

abilities.name: Nether Blast
abilities.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals 65% damage to structures.

abilities.name: Decrepify
abilities.description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Healing on affected allies is increased, while afflicted enemies take extra magic damage instead.

abilities.name: Nether Ward
abilities.description: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell dealing base damage plus the damage multiplier of the mana spent by the enemy hero.

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.description: CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

abilities.name: Nether Ward
abilities.description: Increases cast range.

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.description: Reduces cooldown by 50s. When targeting an enemy hero, Pugna reduces their outgoing spell damage by 8% per second up to a maximum of 75% and increases his own, up to a maximum of 100%. When draining through a Nether Ward using Shard, the rate of increase/decrease is 4% instead. Debuff lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Shadow Strike
abilities.description: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 16 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.

abilities.name: Scream Of Pain
abilities.description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Sonic Wave
abilities.description: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Releases a sonic boom when Queen of Pain blinks, at both her starting and ending locations. Deals 125 damage in a 300 AoE and silences the target for 1,75 seconds.

abilities.name: Shadow Strike
abilities.description: Causes Shadow Strike to become a 375 AoE Spell, and have increased initial damage. When Shadow Strike ends or is re-applied to an enemy Hero, the target emits a Scream of Pain, hitting any nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Burrowstrike
abilities.description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces. Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit

abilities.name: Sand Storm
abilities.description: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units. The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.

abilities.name: Stinger
abilities.description: Sand King strikes an area, performing an attack on all enemies in the area of effect, dealing extra damage to each. Enemies within an innermost radius of 125 take 40% extra damage. Applies Caustic Finale and a slow to all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Epicenter
abilities.description: After a cast point of 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

abilities.name: Epicenter
abilities.description: Increases Epicenter damage per pulse. Every 3,5s causes a small single Epicenter Pulse around Sand King.

abilities.name: Epicenter
abilities.description: When the pulses start, 3 Stinger attack areas are created every 0.5s at random locations, each measuring 15% of the Epicenter's current radius, that apply 50% of Stinger damage to enemies hit. Shard pulses cause 1 attack(s).

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies. Enemies attacking from the smoke or attacking allies within the smoke have a chance to miss their attacks.

abilities.name: Blink Strike
abilities.description: Teleports behind the target unit, momentarily slowing them and striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

abilities.name: Tricks of the Trade
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him. While phased out his attack damage is reduced, but his Agility greatly increases.

abilities.name: Cloak and Dagger
abilities.description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Enemies caught in the smoke screen have their armor reduced by 5 and cannot be targeted by their allies.

abilities.name: Tricks of the Trade
abilities.description: Increases cast range, number of attacks and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.  Each attack hits an additional target.

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Fade Bolt
abilities.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage. Each jump deals less damage.

abilities.name: Arcane Supremacy
abilities.description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane allows him to have a larger cast range and increased potency.

abilities.name: Spell Steal
abilities.description: Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies, and stolen spells last longer on enemies.

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Allows you to target yourself or allies with Telekinesis. Throw range is 35% longer and throw delay is reduced to 0,5 seconds.

abilities.name: Spell Steal
abilities.description: Increases the number of spells that can be stolen to 2. Increases cast range, and upgrades spells to their Scepter version.

abilities.name: Ether Shock
abilities.description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.

abilities.name: Shackles
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, absorbing their life energy over time.

abilities.name: Mass Serpent Ward
abilities.description: Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.

abilities.name: Shackles
abilities.description: Shackles creates 4 Serpent Wards attacking the target. Increases Shackles cast range by 75. Serpent wards lasts 2.5 seconds after Shackles end.

abilities.name: Mass Serpent Ward
abilities.description: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage.

abilities.name: Shadowraze
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.

abilities.name: Feast of Souls
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend gains Bonus Attack Speed for 8 seconds. For the duration of the effect, Shadow Fiend's Max Soul count is increased by 5, but he loses that amount of souls after it is done.

abilities.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Requiem of Souls
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for 0,6 seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of 2,15. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery.

abilities.name: Shadowraze
abilities.description: Cooldown reduced by 2s per enemy hero.

abilities.name: Requiem of Souls
abilities.description: Reduces cooldown and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.

abilities.name: Arcane Curse
abilities.description: Curses the target area, causing enemy heroes to take damage over time and slowing their movement speed. If a target casts a spell, they are silenced for a short period. The duration is paused as long as the target is silenced.

abilities.name: Glaives of Wisdom
abilities.description: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, stealing his target's Intelligence with each hit and dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. After 4 attacks on the same target, that enemy will be silenced for 2,5 seconds.

abilities.name: Last Word
abilities.description: Enemies within 1200 range of Silencer are slowed and damaged every second for each Silence they have on them.

abilities.name: Global Silence
abilities.description: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

abilities.name: Glaives of Wisdom
abilities.description: Increases Stolen Intelligence per hit and steal duration.

abilities.name: Global Silence
abilities.description: Global Silence applies Arcane Curse to heroes.

abilities.name: Disruption
abilities.description: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit with bonus base damage are created under Shadow Demon's control.

abilities.name: Disseminate
abilities.description: Whenever the target takes damage, all enemies, including the target itself if it is an enemy, within 675 range of the target also receive a portion of that damage. Can target enemy and allied units. Effect is paused if the target is hidden by Disruption.

abilities.name: Shadow Poison
abilities.description: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8/16 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50 damage each.  This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.

abilities.name: Demonic Purge
abilities.description: Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration.  The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.

abilities.name: Demonic Cleanse
abilities.description: Cleanses the target allied unit, removing negative buffs for the duration.  At the end of the duration, the unit is healed. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Cleanse.

abilities.name: Demonic Cleanse
abilities.description: Cooldown is removed, replaced with 2 charges that replenish every 70 seconds.

abilities.name: Arcane Bolt
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence.

abilities.name: Concussive Shot
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect. Deals 75% damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Ancient Seal
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.

abilities.name: Mystic Flare
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Arcane Bolt
abilities.description: When Skywrath Mage casts Arcane Bolt, 1 bolts are created, one aimed at the original target, and the other at a random enemy within 700 range of the original target. Heroes will take priority.

abilities.name: Concussive Shot
abilities.description: When Skywrath Mage casts Concussive Shot, a different random target within cast range will be hit with the same ability. Heroes will take priority.

abilities.name: Guardian Sprint
abilities.description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units.

abilities.name: Slithereen Crush
abilities.description: Slams the ground, leaving a puddle of water, and stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

abilities.name: Bash of the Deep
abilities.description: After 3 attacks, your next attack will bash the target. Deals double damage against creeps.

abilities.name: Corrosive Haze
abilities.description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility. The enemy unit leaves a trail of water behind it for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Slithereen Crush
abilities.description: Slithereen Crush now applies Corrosive Haze for a short time to units affected.

abilities.name: Slithereen Crush
abilities.description: Increases Slithereen Crush puddle radius and duration.

abilities.name: Dark Pact
abilities.description: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 30% of the damage.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: Slark leaps forward, leashing the first hero he connects.  That unit can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.

abilities.name: Essence Shift
abilities.description: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility. If Slark kills an affected enemy hero, he permanently steals 1 Agility.

abilities.name: Shadow Dance
abilities.description: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.

abilities.name: Depth Shroud
abilities.description: Creates a cloud at the target location. All allies inside the radius are hidden and affected by Shadow Dance.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: Provides charges and increases range.

abilities.name: Shrapnel
abilities.description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every 35 seconds.

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and knock back his enemies. Knockback distance increases based on how close the enemy is to Sniper. Headshots briefly slow enemy movement and attack speed by -100%.

abilities.name: Take Aim
abilities.description: Increases armor, Headshot chance, and attack range. Slows you by 65% for the duration.

abilities.name: Assassinate
abilities.description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals Sniper's attack damage plus bonus damage at long range and mini-stuns the target. Whenever Sniper kills an enemy hero, Assassinate is refreshed.

abilities.name: Concussive Grenade
abilities.description: Launches a grenade at the target area, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them and Sniper himself back. Enemies affected are disarmed and have their movement slowed after the knockback.

abilities.name: Assassinate
abilities.description: Causes Assassinate to fire quicker and stun the enemy target.

abilities.name: Scatterblast
abilities.description: Snapfire unloads with a wide blast that damages and slows enemies in a cone. Damage, Movement Slow, Attack Slow and Slow Duration are increased by 50% for enemies caught at point-blank range.

abilities.name: Firesnap Cookie
abilities.description: Snapfire feeds a potent cookie to Mortimer or an ally, causing them to hop a short distance. The hopping unit stuns and damages enemies in the landing zone.

abilities.name: Lil' Shredder
abilities.description: Snapfire heats up her mounted turret to rapidly fire 5 attacks dealing fixed damage plus a percentage of her attack damage. Each attack reduces the enemy's armor. Provides bonus attack range for the duration.

abilities.name: Mortimer Kisses
abilities.description: Snapfire's friend launches a barrage of firespit globs over 5,5 seconds. Globs cause impact damage and create pools of firespit, which slow and apply damage over time. Snapfire has a reduced turn rate for the duration and a minimum launch range of 600. Each glob can be targeted with a right click.

abilities.name: Firesnap Cookie
abilities.description: Firesnap cookies become even more potent, healing the target and launching a Mortimer Kiss that does 50% impact damage to the landing destination.

abilities.name: Gobble Up
abilities.description: Mortimer gobbles up a creep or an allied hero, which he can then spit towards enemies. The unit stays in his belly up to 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Spectral Dagger
abilities.description: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.

abilities.name: Desolate
abilities.description: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy that does not have any allied units within a 400 radius around them.

abilities.name: Dispersion
abilities.description: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: Creates a spectral nemesis to haunt a single visible enemy hero. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places with any haunting illusion.

abilities.name: Dispersion
abilities.description: Dispersion can be activated to increase the amount absorbed and reflected by Dispersion by 50% of its base values for 5s. Cooldown 25. Manacost 50.

abilities.name: Haunt
abilities.description: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero. Illusions spawned from this ability follow the same rules as Shadow Step illusions and can also be swapped to by using Reality.

abilities.name: Storm Hammer
abilities.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.

abilities.name: Great Cleave
abilities.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.

abilities.name: Warcry
abilities.description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: God's Strength
abilities.description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage and slow resistance for 35 seconds.

abilities.name: Warcry
abilities.description: Warcry is now undispellable and passively grants 6 armor to all allies near Sven. Increases active movement speed bonus.

abilities.name: Storm Hammer
abilities.description: Increases cast range and applies a basic dispel on the target. Can be cast on invulnerable targets. If alt-cast, it deals an additional 180 damage and Sven travels with the Storm Hammer.

abilities.name: Charge of Darkness
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects, starting at 25% of the bonus speed and reaching his max speed after 1,5s.

abilities.name: Bulldoze
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker gains movement speed and status resistance to ram through enemies. Can be used while charging.

abilities.name: Greater Bash
abilities.description: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.

abilities.name: Nether Strike
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage. Knocks back for double the normal distance.

abilities.name: Charge of Darkness
abilities.description: Increases Charge of Darkness Bonus Speed by 100.

abilities.name: Planar Pocket
abilities.description: Barathrum distorts the fabric of planar space, increasing his own magic resistance and redirecting enemy hero spells in a radius towards him.

abilities.name: Static Remnant
abilities.description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.

abilities.name: Electric Vortex
abilities.description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
abilities.description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 25+7,5% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10+0,65% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Can be activated to grant Storm Spirit and nearby allied heroes 3 Overload charges. Provides bonus Attack Speed. Lasts up to 12 seconds or until the charges are depleted.

abilities.name: Electric Vortex
abilities.description: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.

abilities.name: Reflection
abilities.description: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all enemy heroes in a target area. Affected enemy heroes have movement and attack speeds slowed and attacked by their reflection.

abilities.name: Conjure Image
abilities.description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.

abilities.name: Metamorphosis
abilities.description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack. Any of Terrorblade's illusions that are within 1200 range will also be transformed by Metamorphosis.

abilities.name: Sunder
abilities.description: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.

abilities.name: Demon Zeal
abilities.description: Costs part of Terrorblade's current HP to cast, providing Terrorblade and nearby illusions bonus movement, HP Regen and attack speed. Reflection illusions gain 50% of the bonuses. Can't be cast while in Metamorphosis and Metamorphosis will remove Demon Zeal

abilities.name: Terror Wave
abilities.description: Causes a wave to travel outwards in all directions forcing enemy heroes to become Feared upon impact and dealing damage, and grants Terrorblade Metamorphosis for a short time.

abilities.name: Sticky Bomb
abilities.description: Lobs a Sticky Bomb towards the target area. If it lands next to an enemy hero, the bomb will stick to it, slowing its movement speed. After a few seconds the bomb will explode, dealing damage in an area around the detonation and applying a secondary slow for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Reactive Tazer
abilities.description: Techies trigger an electric charge giving them bonus movement speed for a short period of time. Enemies attacking Techies are temporarily disarmed and get a Basic Dispel. At the end of the effect, the charge explodes, disarming all enemies within the radius.

abilities.name: Blast Off!
abilities.description: Techies hurtle themselves into the enemy's midst, detonating charges upon impact which deal massive area of effect damage and stun enemies. Upon landing, the assault deals Techies non-lethal damage equal to a percentage of their current health.

abilities.name: Proximity Mines
abilities.description: Plant an invisible mine that cannot be detected by True Sight, but is visible if an enemy is within the active 500 AoE of the mine. Mines detonate if an enemy is standing within the active AoE for 1 seconds dealing damage and temporarily reducing the enemy's Magic Resistance. The explosion deals full damage if the target is within 150 radius and decreases up to 50% on the edge. Deals 30% damage to buildings.

abilities.name: Reactive Tazer
abilities.description: Reactive Tazer can be cast on allies and deals damage on detonation. Also deals damage to any enemy that attacks the affected ally.

abilities.name: Minefield Sign
abilities.description: Increases radius and duration of Minefield Sign. When an enemy hero walks within 200 units of a minefield sign, the 500 units area around the sign will become a minefield for 10 seconds, dealing damage to enemy units any time they move within its area. Minefield Sign is destroyed after this effect ends.

abilities.name: Refraction
abilities.description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, gaining a small barrier and bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances. If a barrier is consumed, a new one is created as long as there are charges left. If an instance of damage would deal more damage than the remaining barrier, all of the damage is absorbed.

abilities.name: Meld
abilities.description: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still.  If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Psi Blades
abilities.description: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range. For each unit it damages, the spill damage is reduced by a percentage.

abilities.name: Psionic Trap
abilities.description: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they deal a small amount of damage and exert a slowing influence of 20% in the area. Traps charge up to slow 50% after 3,5 seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.

abilities.name: Psionic Trap
abilities.description: Increases max trap count and trap vision range.  When activated, traps now silence affected enemies.

abilities.name: Psionic Projection
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after channeling for 2 seconds, detonating it upon arrival as if it was fully charged and instantly dealing 300 bonus damage. Channeling Psionic Projection does not break Meld.

abilities.name: Laser
abilities.description: Fires an intense energy beam, damaging and blinding the target. Blinded targets miss all physical attacks.

abilities.name: March of the Machines
abilities.description: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.

abilities.name: Defense Matrix
abilities.description: Targets an allied unit, applying an all damage barrier to them that also provides Status Resistance.

abilities.name: Rearm
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on Tinker's abilities.

abilities.name: Warp Flare
abilities.description: Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away, rooting them and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Laser
abilities.description: Upgrades Tinker's Laser into a Shrink Ray, reducing the main target's size, current health, and maximum health by 10% (stacking). The laser bounces once on the farthest target up to 700 range from the primary one, prioritizing heroes.

abilities.name: Whirling Death
abilities.description: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area. If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration. Whirling Death will deal bonus damage per tree destroyed.

abilities.name: Timber Chain
abilities.description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.

abilities.name: Reactive Armor
abilities.description: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor. Hero attacks are counted as 3x the amount.

abilities.name: Chakram
abilities.description: Fires Timbersaw's main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and Timbersaw loses the ability to attack.

abilities.name: Twisted Chakram
abilities.description: Launches a second independent Chakram that follows a curved path and returns to Timbersaw, damaging and slowing enemies it passes through. Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5% of health missing.

abilities.name: Flamethrower
abilities.description: Releases a flame in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Applies a debuff that deals damage per second and slows enemy movement speed. Affects buildings for reduced damage.

abilities.name: Reactive Armor
abilities.description: Reactive Armor can now be activated to get max stacks and 200 damage barrier. Grants Timbersaw 100 + 75 barrier amount per second for each enemy hero within 600 radius of Timbersaw up to a maximum of 800. After 8 seconds, Timbersaw deals damage to every hero within 600 radius equal to 200 + his remaining barrier amount and loses all of his barrier.

abilities.name: Gush
abilities.description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.

abilities.name: Kraken Shell
abilities.description: Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage.

abilities.name: Anchor Smash
abilities.description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Dead in the Water
abilities.description: Tidehunter attaches a heavy anchor to an enemy hero. The hero is leashed while attached to the anchor. Attempting to move more than 350 units away from the anchor forces the hero to 100 move speed, dragging the anchor behind them. The anchor can be destroyed with 4 hero attacks.

abilities.name: Gush
abilities.description: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.

abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
abilities.description: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 950 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.

abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Melee)
abilities.description: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.

abilities.name: Fervor
abilities.description: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.

abilities.name: Berserker's Rage
abilities.description: While in melee form, Troll Warlord's attacks have a chance to ensnare, preventing the target from moving or using mobility spells and has additional movement speed and armor.

abilities.name: Battle Trance
abilities.description: Troll unleashes a powerful battle trance, that forces you to continuously attack the closest enemy unit within 900 range, prioritizing heroes. Damage does not kill you during this mode. Grants you bonus lifesteal, attack speed and movement speed. Applies a Basic Dispel.

abilities.name: Fervor
abilities.description: Increases max Fervor stacks by 3 and grants Troll 16% + 3% chance per Fervor stack of firing an additional ranged attack to any unit within its ranged attack range plus 175.

abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
abilities.description: Causes Whirling Axes (Ranged) to dispel enemies. Reduces cooldown and mana cost.

abilities.name: Avalanche
abilities.description: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does 100% bonus damage to units being tossed

abilities.name: Toss
abilities.description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 300 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.

abilities.name: Tree Grab
abilities.description: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.

abilities.name: Grow
abilities.description: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, movement speed and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.

abilities.name: Tree Throw
abilities.description: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.

abilities.name: Tree Grab
abilities.description: Causes Tree Grab to have no charge limit.

abilities.name: Tree Volley
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.

abilities.name: Nature's Grasp
abilities.description: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through. Vines deal 50% more damage if they touch a tree. Does half damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Leech Seed
abilities.description: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it. Healing to creeps is reduced by 50%.

abilities.name: Living Armor
abilities.description: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which heals the target and provides bonus armor.

abilities.name: Overgrowth
abilities.description: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that deal damage to afflicted enemies and prevent them from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.

abilities.name: Nature's Guise
abilities.description: Causes Treant to become invisible with Nature's Guise and root enemies upon attacking. Deals damage over time and roots for longer if the attack was near a tree. Total damage equals 100 + 75% of Treant's Base Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Eyes In The Forest
abilities.description: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged. Passively causes all trees to respawn much faster.

abilities.name: Decay
abilities.description: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself. Deals 2x damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Soul Rip
abilities.description: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.

abilities.name: Tombstone
abilities.description: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.

abilities.name: Flesh Golem
abilities.description: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem. Gains a percentage increase to strength and imbues attacks with a slow and damage amplification.

abilities.name: Tombstone
abilities.description: Tombstone can be cast on an allied hero to bunker inside of the tombstone. Heroes that enter the Tombstone cannot leave for 2 seconds nor can they re-enter after leaving. If the tombstone is destroyed with a hero inside, that hero gets stunned for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Decay
abilities.description: Increases strength steal.

abilities.name: Ice Shards
abilities.description: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Snowball
abilities.description: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a 350 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage and stun duration.

abilities.name: Walrus PUNCH!
abilities.description: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike with bonus damage so powerful it launches its victim into the air.

abilities.name: Tag Team
abilities.description: Activate to temporarily apply a negative debuff aura around you, causing enemies that are attacked under it to take bonus physical damage and reduced movement speed. Lasts 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Drinking Buddies
abilities.description: Tusk reaches out to tag an allied unit, pulling them closer. Once tagged, both Tusk and his tagged ally gain movement speed and attack damage. Can be put on alt-cast to only pull Tusk towards his ally with 50% reduced cast range.

abilities.name: Ice Shards
abilities.description: Increases depth of Ice Shards, and enemies trapped within an ice shard are slowed and take damage per second.

abilities.name: Walrus Kick
abilities.description: Kicks the closest enemy unit in the drawn direction, stunning, damaging, and slowing them. Also deals damage to all heroes within 250 radius of its landing area. Cooldown is reduced by 50% if kicking a creep.

abilities.name: Firestorm
abilities.description: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.

abilities.name: Pit of Malice
abilities.description: A deadly pit is conjured at the target location; any unit that enters will be damaged and rooted. Each enemy unit within the pit are affected by the root only every 3,6 seconds.

abilities.name: Atrophy Aura
abilities.description: Nearby enemy units are weakened, losing a portion of their base damage. If an enemy dies while under this effect, Underlord gains temporary bonus damage.

abilities.name: Fiend's Gate
abilities.description: Opens 2 portals, one next to Underlord and one in the target location. Heroes can channel a portal for 3,5 seconds to teleport to the other side. Portals have to be at least 1500 away from each other.

abilities.name: Firestorm
abilities.description: Firestorm can be allied targeted. When used that way, the Firestorm follows the hero around.  The wave count is increased, and tick rate / duration time occur more quickly.

abilities.name: Pit of Malice
abilities.description: Increases radius of the Pit of Malice.

abilities.name: Earthshock
abilities.description: Ursa leaps forward 250 units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed and slow resistance for a number of subsequent attacks.

abilities.name: Fury Swipes
abilities.description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 8 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

abilities.name: Enrage
abilities.description: Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs.

abilities.name: Earthshock
abilities.description: Earthshock applies a 1,4 second Enrage on Ursa when cast.

abilities.name: Enrage
abilities.description: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.

abilities.name: Venomous Gale
abilities.description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.

abilities.name: Poison Sting
abilities.description: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks and slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: Plague Ward
abilities.description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.

abilities.name: Noxious Plague
abilities.description: Infects an enemy with a deadly plague that does an initial burst of damage and additional damage over time based on the unit's maximum health. The plague slows the target and nearby enemies based on their distance to the target. When the target dies or the debuff expires, all nearby enemies are infected with a noncommunicable version of the plague.

abilities.name: Venomous Gale
abilities.description: If Venomous Gale is dispelled in any way, the target will receive 300 damage and be stunned for 1.6 seconds.

abilities.name: Septic Shock
abilities.description: Increases base damage per debuff. Plague Wards also deal Septic Shock damage based on their attack damage.

abilities.name: Poison Attack
abilities.description: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to 6 times.

abilities.name: Nethertoxin
abilities.description: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Units in it have their attack speed slowed.

abilities.name: Corrosive Skin
abilities.description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a 1200 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.

abilities.name: Viper Strike
abilities.description: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also disabling their passives and dealing poison damage over time. The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

abilities.name: Poison Attack
abilities.description: Increases max stacks, and causes Poison Attack to lower armor per stack and to affect buildings for reduced damage.

abilities.name: Nosedive
abilities.description: Viper slams into the ground, splattering each enemy in a 500 AoE for 4 seconds with the effect of Corrosive Skin.

abilities.name: Magic Missile
abilities.description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Wave of Terror
abilities.description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the total attack damage and armor of enemies, and giving vision of the path ahead.

abilities.name: Vengeance Aura
abilities.description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby friendly heroes.

abilities.name: Nether Swap
abilities.description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target. Enemy Swapped units take damage. Vengeful Spirit and allied swapped units gain a barrier equal to the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Magic Missile
abilities.description: Bounces once on an enemy, prioritizing heroes, within 75% of Magic Missile's current cast range from the first target.

abilities.name: Vengeance Aura
abilities.description: Upon death, creates a strong illusion of Vengeful Spirit that deals and takes full damage and can cast all of her spells. If the illusion is alive when Vengeful Spirit respawn, she will take its place. XP earned by her illusion is given to her. Strong Illusions are not instantly killed by spells.

abilities.name: Aether Remnant
abilities.description: Void Spirit dispatches a remnant to the target location. The remnant stands watch over the region, facing the direction of his vector. When a unit crosses its gaze, the remnant pulls it in and damages it.

abilities.name: Dissimilate
abilities.description: Void Spirit temporarily fades into the aether, creating a number of portals through which he can reassemble himself. Upon exiting a portal, he damages all enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Resonant Pulse
abilities.description: Void Spirit wraps himself in a protective shield that absorbs physical damage and emits a single damaging pulse around him. The shield gains increased damage absorption for each enemy hero the pulse hits.

abilities.name: Astral Step
